What is the maximum number of nodes that can be specified in the "nodes" array?
The maximum number of nodes that can be specified in the "nodes" array is 8.
Can I specify a "nodeidentity" as an integer?
No, you cannot specify a "nodeidentity" as an integer. A "nodeidentity" is a string, and it can be an internet, TOR, or other supported address for the node.
What is the data type of "paymentaddress"?
The data type of "paymentaddress" is an integer (int). It represents the rewards payment address.
